content: > this kitty is an adorable way to keep your door open >make it all black for a cute halloween decoration lion brand pattern # 90695ad skill level easy 1 ball each of 2 colors a 860-153 vanna s choice yarn black b 860-100 vanna s choice yarn white crochet hook - size g-6 4 25 mm additional materials required 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter small amounts of grey and red yarn fiberfill stuffing plastic stuffing pellets stitch markers large-eye blunt needle ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see also 90694ad amigurumi mouse doorstop 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-mouse-doorstop
